edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.fitting

Class FitParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.fitting.FitParameters
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class FitParameters
extends Object
implements Serializable
    A class that holds the parameters that are the result of a fit of an ImageObject.
    Author:
    Colin J. Fuller
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FitParameters()
      Creates a new fit parameters object with no parameter values.

    • Method Detail

      • getPosition

        public double getPosition(int dim)
        Gets the position of the object associated with these parameters in the supplied dimension.
        Parameters:
        dim - an int that specifies the dimension; this should be one of the dimension constants from ImageCoordinate or a user-defined dimension.
        Returns:
        the position in that dimension.

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(int dim,
               double value)
        Sets the position of the object associated with these parameters in the supplied dimension.
        Parameters:
        dim - an int that specifies the dimension; this should be one of the dimension constants from ImageCoordinate or a user-defined dimension.
        value - the position in the supplied dimension

        Returns:
        the size in that dimension.

      • getOtherParameters

        public double getOtherParameters(String parameter)
        Gets the value of a named parameter associated with the fit object.
        Parameters:
        parameter - a String naming the parameter
        Returns:
        the value of the named parameter as a double

      • setOtherParameter

        public void setOtherParameter(String parameter,
                     double value)
        Sets the value of a named parameter associated with the fit object.
        Parameters:
        parameter - a String naming the parameter
        value - the value of the named parameter as a double

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Creates a String representation of the parameters. Format is amplitude, background, pos in each channel, size in each channel, other parameters.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        a String containing the parameter information.
